title: Weird Lag In League
body: So my wifi is fine but when i am playing league i get 30 ms but constantly it says that im reconnecting but i put all my league clients at high priority... what is going on?

replies.body: Your wifi might not be fine, you may need some[ ethernet romance](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8O1BqcG3uEA).  >.<  Let's be sure, though, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get an overview for your specific case and let me know what you find out.
